tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have been married for 6 years, but getting pregnant was not as easy as we had expected. We consulted Dr. Aruna mam and felt immediately comfortable with her. We've had two failed IUI's and were worried what to do next. Aruna Mam explained exactly what went wrong with the previous IUI and what steps we should take next. My husband and I silently followed her instructions and I am now 7 weeks pregnant. Our sincere thanks cannot be expressed in words. Not only the Doctor, but also the staff members are very friendly and helpful. We hope this will continue until I give birth to my baby. Thank you for all the guidance and support you have given us.
reply_text: Thank u for the lovely feedback , wishing u all the best for the smooth pregnancy ahead .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr. Aruna at Xpert for a quick check up as my regular Dr was not available. It was also for a second opinion for a few reports that had us confused. 

Must say, I wish we had found her during the early days of my pregnancy. She is super calm and patent, listens to you and explains the medical terms in the simplest manner to make you understand your status and build confidence for the situations you might be experiencing. 

It was definitely a pleasant experience and we walked out with a smiling. I would totally recommend Dr. Aruna any day!

review:
I've been consulting with Dr. Aruna Sahadev an year before I got conceived, and gave birth to a very beautiful baby girl this February 2020. Her way of treatment is very nice, very specific, addresses the problems concisely *** **** *** ********* *** *********** *********** Apart from the treatment and consultation, she fills in a lot of positivity and feel good factors, which I believe, makes her unique in her profession 

She was there with me all the time, answering my questions and clarifying over all necessary things, into me getting admitted to hospital for delivery, was available all through the day and night, carried out delivery procedures and post delivery procedures. Dr also ensured that everything goes smoothly and gave me all the necessary guidance to stay healthy, stress free and a happy parenting times
reply_text: Thank you rashmi for your feedback. Stay safe and God bless the baby with all happiness and health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been consulting Aruna mam from February 2020 for infertility treatment. she diagnosed the problem and suggested required tests for me and husband. she is very friendly and gives lot of attention and time in every consultation. she exhausted all the options before suggesting me to go for IVF. My 1 St attempt to conceive with IVF failed and she performed hysteroscopy to ensure 2nd attempt is successful..My 2 nd IVF attempt was successful and i conceived. Throughout my pregnancy i was following her suggestions and she handled my case very efficiently ( i had BP issues and other early pregnancy complications). She always put me on right medications which helped me to carry a full term pregnancy and i gave birth to healthy baby girl..I can't thank her enough for giving me the boon of motherhood..And special thanks to staff especially Selvi for helping with appointments and other queriesThank you so much Aruna mam ðŸ™‚
reply_text: Thank u so much for trusting us and continuing the treatment and following all the instructions, wishing u all the best for the happy parenthood .

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Doctor friendliness can be improved. As this is my first pregnancy and had some difficult time in my first trimester i wanted to approach my doctor directly for immergency. Doctor was annoyed to receive my call when i had called her phone because i was having high fever and not sure which medicine to take . It was after 6 pm and the clinic was closed. For immergency when clinic is closed doctor suggested me to visit motherhood hospital which is 15km far from my house which had upset me a bit thinking if my doctor (my only rescue) really cares about me or i am just one of her 100th patient. I was allowed to call her phone only if all options are rulled out. Dr. Aruna did advise me and her medicines helped me conceive for which I am grateful to her .
For a Dr. Aruna it's a regular job to see a patient, but for me it's my first pregnancy and everything is new, few things are scary. I wish I had little more comfort with my doctor and dint have to go for second openion.
